ADCBuf_Params_t Struct Reference
ADCBUF Driver External Data Structures

ADC Parameters. More...

#include <drivers/adcbuf/ADCBuf.h>

Data Fields

ADCBufSource source
 ADC buffer source, DFE or HIL.
 
uint8_t continousMode
 Continuous mode selection.
 
uint8_t chirpThreshold
 xwr14xx only: Chirp Threshold for non-continous operation
 
uint8_t chirpThresholdPing
 xwr16xx/xwr18xx/xwr68xx: Ping buffer Chirp Threshold for non-continous operation
 
uint8_t chirpThresholdPong
 xwr16xx/xwr18xx/xwr68xx: Pong buffer Chirp Threshold for non-continous operation
 
void * custom
 Custom configuration, Pointer to a device specific extension of the ADCBuf_Params.
 
SOC_Handle socHandle
 SOC Handle.
 

Detailed Description

ADC Parameters.

ADC Parameters are used to with the ADCBuf_open() call. Default values for these parameters are set using ADCBuf_Params_init().

See also
ADCBuf_Params_init()
